title: Penne With Chicken Sausage And Spinach
ingredients: 1pound sweet or hot Italian chicken sausage, casings removed
½cup oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, rinsed and chopped fine
directions: 1. Heat oil in 12-inch nonstick skillet over medium-high heat until just smoking. Add sausage and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until no longer pink, about 4 minutes. Stir in garlic and cook until fragrant, about 30 seconds.

2. Stir in broth, water, tomatoes, salt, and pasta. Increase heat to medium-high and cook at vigorous simmer, stirring often, until pasta is tender and sauce has thickened, 15 to 18 minutes. Stir in spinach, 1 handful at a time, and cook until wilted. Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve with Parmesan.
